content.question: Late-nineteenth-century transoceanic labor migrations were most directly facilitated by which of the following developments?

choices.label: The restructuring of traditional social hierarchies
The development of new, more affordable methods of transportation
The growing popularity of free-trade economic policies

content.answer: The development of new, more affordable methods of transportation

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
